title: Cant send picture messages - file too large
content: My wife is having trouble sending me pictures from her new pixel 3 XL to my new pixel 3 XL. She can send pics to anyone else but when she tries to take a picture directly from the message app and send to me she gets a "file too large" error message. Not sure if this is an issue on her phone or mine but it seems to only happen when she sends pictures to me
